name: dbus

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
D-Bus is a message bus system, a simple way for applications to talk to
one another. D-Bus supplies both a system daemon (for events such new
hardware device printer queue ) and a per-user-login-session daemon (for
general IPC needs among user applications). Also, the message bus is
built on top of a general one-to-one message passing framework, which
can be used by any two applications to communicate directly (without
going through the message bus daemon).

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries

dependencies.name: expat
dependencies.description: Expat is an XML parser library written in C.

dependencies.name: glib
dependencies.description:
GLib provides the core application building blocks for libraries and
applications written in C. The GLib package contains a low-level
libraries useful for providing data structure handling for C,
portability wrappers and interfaces for such runtime functionality as an
event loop, threads, dynamic loading and an object system.

dependencies.name: xmlto
dependencies.description:
Utility xmlto is a simple shell script for converting XML files to
various formats. It serves as easy to use command line frontend to make
fine output without remembering many long options and searching for the
syntax of the backends.

dependent_to.name: tracy
dependent_to.description:
A real time, nanosecond resolution, remote telemetry, hybrid frame and
sampling profiler for games and other applications. Server applications.

dependent_to.name: qt
dependent_to.description: Qt is a comprehensive cross-platform C++ application framework.

dependent_to.name: at-spi2-core
dependent_to.description:
The At-Spi2 Core package provides a Service Provider Interface for the
Assistive Technologies available on the GNOME platform and a library
against which applications can be linked.

dependent_to.name: pulseaudio
dependent_to.description:
PulseAudio is a sound system for POSIX OSes, meaning that it is a proxy
for your sound applications. PulseAudio is a sound system for POSIX
OSes, meaning that it is a proxy for your sound applications. It allows
you to do advanced operations on your sound data as it passes between
your application and your hardware. Things like transferring the audio
to a different machine, changing the sample format or channel count and
mixing several sounds into one are easily achieved using a sound server.

dependent_to.name: dbus-glib
dependent_to.description: dbus-glib package provides GLib interface for D-Bus API.

dependent_to.name: gconf
dependent_to.description:
GConf is a system for storing application preferences. Note that this
software is now deprecated in favor of moving to GSettings and dconf
with the GNOME 3 transition.

dependent_to.name: cube
dependent_to.description:
Cube the profile viewer for Score-P and Scalasca profiles. It displays a
multi-dimensional performance space consisting of the dimensions: -
performance metric - call path - system resource

dependent_to.name: kitty
dependent_to.description: fast, featureful, cross-platform, GPU-based terminal emulator
